problem_text_cn: 在菱形ABCD中,AC=2,BD=5,点P是对角线AC上任意一点,过点P作PE∥AD,PF∥AB,交AB、AD分别为E、F,则图中阴影部分的面积为()
problem_text_en: In the diamond ABCD, AC = N_0, BD = N_1, point P is any point on the diagonal AC, passing point P is PE ∥ AD, PF ∥ AB, crossing AB and AD are E and F respectively, then the figure is shaded The area of ​​the part is ()
raw_answer: 解:在菱形ABCD中,∵PE∥AD,PF∥AB,∴四边形AEPF是菱形,∴S~△AEP~=S~△AFP~,∵菱形的对角线把菱形分成四个全等的三角形,∴阴影部分的面积等于菱形面积的一半,∵AC=2,BD=5,∴菱形的面积=\frac{1}{2}×2×5=5,∴阴影部分的面积为\frac{1}{2}×5=\frac{5}{2}．故选:B．
